comment: I took her for bio lab and it was amazing! She's super nice and organized. All of her directions are straight forward and she helps a lot if you don't understand! definitely would recommend.

I had her for bio 1 and i absolutely loved her. It is such and easy A if you do all the work correctly and submit everything on time. She is very caring and helps her students get the best grade. Her course load wasnt hard at all. Pre lab and post lab quizzes and just lab worksheets and she dropped a few grades. would def recommend her
She was the best professor I've had for Bio so far, and she did really well for her first year. She cares for her students and wants them to succeed. Please take her if you have the chance.
Professor Souza is great! She is very nice and explains things well. She wants you to do your best in the class.
